CopycatMod:SummoningMirror.NAME: Summoning Mirror
CopycatMod:SummoningMirror.FLAVOR: This scary reflector can copy and summon all your other stuff!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, summon a Replica with HP equal to the number of Relics. Replica copies a random Relic and gives the same effect while alive.
